entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
